Intro.title: Ready for anything, until destination.
Intro.subtitle: Logistics that keeps you always ahead.

ServicesIntro.title: Logistics Services and Solutions
ServicesIntro.subtitle: Regardless of your industry, cargo, or key markets, DJENDJEN provides logistics solutions that support the growth of businesses of all sizes.

About.title: Our History & Vision
About.subtitle: Trusted Logistics Partner Since 2013
About.history: DjenDjen was established in 2013 with a single mission: to provide the most reliable goods transportation service in Algeria. Over the last decade, we have grown from a local carrier to a national logistics powerhouse.
About.values: Our core values are reliability, integrity, and efficiency. We believe in building long-term relationships with our clients through consistent performance.
About.experience: With over 10 years of operational excellence, we have faced and overcome every logistical challenge imaginable.

hero.title: Reliable Land Freight Transportation
hero.subtitle: Fast, secure, and cost-effective cargo transport across cities and regions.

item1.title: Foundation
item1.desc: Establishment of DjenDjen with a clear vision.

item2.title: Expansion
item2.desc: Expanded fleet significantly to cover key regions.

item3.title: National Leader
item3.desc: Recognized as a trusted partner across 58 wilayas.

valuesSection.title: Our Core Values

reliability.title: Reliability

integrity.desc: Building trust through safe and honest operations.

efficiency.title: Efficiency

expertise.title: Expertise & Commitment

items.handling: Loading and unloading at company depots

Services.title: Our Expertise
Services.subtitle: Comprehensive Transport Solutions
Services.intro: We provide a full spectrum of logistics and transportation services designed to meet the rigorous demands of modern industry.

transport.title: Goods Transportation
transport.desc: Road transport solutions for all quantities, ensuring secure and timely delivery of your goods across the national territory.

handling.title: Loading & Unloading
handling.desc: Specialized handling operations at our depots, with rigorous monitoring to preserve the integrity of your products.

pickup.title: On-Demand Pickup Service
pickup.desc: A complementary collection service at the address of your choice, providing maximum logistical flexibility tailored to your specific needs.

recovery.title: Cash Collection Service
recovery.desc: Professional and secure management of your funds, ensuring total reliability and fast reconciliation of your transactions.

Coverage.title: National Coverage
Coverage.subtitle: Serving 58 Wilayas
Coverage.desc: We cover the vast majority of the national territory. While we aim for 100% coverage, please contact us to confirm specific remote locations.
Coverage.disclaimer: * Exact coverage details should be confirmed with our team.

info.address: El Hamiz - Dar El Beida – Algiers
